backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI change scoped to a specific span element and the file it affects.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for multiple frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router routes, shared layout, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AffiliateCtaPlac: Affiliate CTA card component with title, description, and full‑width centered button.
frontend/src/components/CinematicHero.ts: Cinematic hero section with parallax background video layers, overlays, and scroll/interaction logic.
Interactive destination card with hover animations, image zoom, badges, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/HeroLineSketchOv: SVG overlay rendering animated topographic line sketches with mobile adaptation.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveIndia: Renders an interactive India map with clickable region markers that show tooltips and scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/MasonryGrid.tsx: Simple wrapper rendering children inside a masonry layout div.
Provides a mobile bottom navigation bar with route-aware icons and links.
frontend/src/components/MotionReveal.tsx: Fade‑in and slide‑up animation wrapper using intersection observer visibility.
frontend/src/components/RippleButton.tsx: Extends a button to show temporary ripple effects at click positions.
Wraps content with fade transitions triggered by router navigation events.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays site footer with branding, links, resources, and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with desktop and mobile navigation, theme toggle, and scroll-based styling.
frontend/src/components/SocialProofGalle: Horizontally scrollable gallery showing user‑generated images with captions.
frontend/src/components/TagChip.tsx: Styled tag badge component mapping tag types to icons and theme classes.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Dropdown-triggered theme switcher allowing light, dark, or system mode.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadges.tsx: Shows a row of trust indicator badges with icons and labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient setup with configurable options and exposes login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionReveal: A hook that reveals elements when they intersect the viewport using IntersectionObserver. Returns a ref and visibility state with reduced‑motion and trigger‑once handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Implements a parallax scroll effect with performance safeguards, reduced‑motion checks, and mobile intensity adjustments. Returns a ref that applies translateY transforms when visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing actor and fetch state for future backend queries. Currently returns values from useActor without additional logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and a custom color system for light and dark modes. Adds typography, layout styles, and utilities for hero gradients and parallax effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider. Mounts App into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Renders a blog listing page with a featured post and multiple post previews using cards, badges, and motion reveal effects. Includes mock post data and links to individual blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post based on the route slug using mock content, including header metadata and rich HTML content. Provides navigation back to the blog list.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPage.tsx: Displays budget-based travel ranges with icons, destinations, and tips using animated cards.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Shows community features like sharing stories and finding travel buddies, plus a coming-soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationDetailPage: Renders a detailed view of a destination with hero image, snapshot info, and expandable sections.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationsPage.tsx: Lists all destinations with search, filters, and category tabs, rendering cards in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the main landing page with hero section, featured destinations, maps, and budget categories.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Defines project vision, design guidelines, performance constraints, and feature requirements for building the Hidden Trails India platform without any email-related functionality. Includes UI/UX direction, scalability notes, animation rules, and existing non‑email feature definitions.
